name: Budi Santoso
testimonial: Alelm Technology telah membantu kami membangun platform e-commerce yang luar biasa. Tim mereka sangat profesional dan responsif.
testimonialEn: Alelm Technology has helped us build an incredible e-commerce platform. Their team is very professional and responsive.

name: Siti Rahayu
testimonial: Aplikasi kesehatan yang dikembangkan Alelm Technology sangat membantu pasien kami. UI/UX yang intuitif membuat pengguna mudah menggunakannya.
testimonialEn: The health app developed by Alelm Technology has been very helpful for our patients. The intuitive UI/UX makes it easy for users.

name: Ahmad Pratama
testimonial: Redesign dashboard kami sangat memuaskan. Conversion rate meningkat signifikan setelah redesign dari Alelm Technology.
testimonialEn: Our dashboard redesign was very satisfying. Conversion rates increased significantly after the redesign by Alelm Technology.

name: Dewi Lestari
testimonial: Sistem POS dari Alelm Technology sangat membantu operasional restoran kami. Semua berjalan lebih efisien sekarang.
testimonialEn: The POS system from Alelm Technology has been very helpful for our restaurant operations. Everything runs more efficiently now.
